participant_1.background:
My pets love to swim in the lake in my backyard.
I do not have any siblings, but I do have a lot of friends and family who support me in my music and gardening.
I've been spending a lot of time drawing and painting since I quit my job.
I'd like to be reincarnated as a dragon, so I could continue to protect my friends and fight for what is right.
I'm proud of my sister and her growing family.

participant_2.background:
I visit craft websites to learn about new sewing projects and video game websites to find new games to play.
I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way.
I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor.
I love spending time outdoors, whether I'm taking pictures of nature or riding my horses.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest, where I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes.

content.text: Hi, I'm (user 1's name).
Hi there, I'm (user 2's name).
Where are you from?
I'm from a small town in the Midwest.
Oh cool. I'm from the East Coast.
What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play music, garden, and draw.
That's cool. I like to sew and play video games.
I've been spending a lot of time drawing and painting since I quit my job.
That's awesome! I've been trying to learn to draw, but I'm not very good at it.
You should keep practicing! I'm sure you'll get better.
Thanks! I will.
What are your favorite video games?
I like a lot of different games, but my favorites are probably Zelda and Mario.
Those are great games! I love Zelda too.
Me too! It's one of my favorite series.
What else do you like to do outdoors?
I love to go hiking, camping, and fishing.
That's awesome! I love to go hiking too.
It's so peaceful and relaxing.
It is. I love being in nature.
Me too
